...so that I can easily find them back.

* **Fira Code (Retina)**: mono font for coding;
* **Crimson Text**: "for book production in the tradition of beautiful oldstyle typefaces";
* **Crimson Pro**: "contemporary, clear, classic and rounded/open. Something for a college textbook, editorial websites and any reading";
* **EB Garamond**: "intended to be an excellent, classical, Garamond";
* **Palatino Linotype**: "an old-style serif typeface, ideal for use in extended text settings such as books, periodicals and catalogs."
